page.title: 15FASHION/MUSIC IN MELKSHAM
page.content: Fashion and pop music are very closely linked. A lot of the current trends in clothing and hair styles amongst the younger generation follow the more successful pop groups. Duran Duran, probably the most successful group around today give fashion and clothes a clean-cut and tidy image, whereas Boy George and Culture Club dress in rags and wear make-up which makes it hard to tell whether they are male or female. Other groups influence fashions such as Skinheads, who werar tight jeans, large boots and who shave their heads. Punks have brightly coloured hair, dark clothing and use chains and safety pins as jewelry, even through the nose. One notable thing about pop music today is that it is being used as a means to raise mone for disasters like the Ethiopian famine.
